title: NIT Raipur Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for Senior Research Fellow Post
description: The National Institute of Technology (NIT) Raipur has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Senior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech., M.E/ M.Tech in Civil Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the NIT Raipur Recruitment 2025 . Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can ...
